pullrequest.title: Fix build dependency in message generation (#247)

content.raw:
Is it regenerating any of the `.pb.h` or `pb.cc` files (other than the ones associated with the `.proto` file that you changed), or is it only recompiling a bunch of `pb.cc.o` files?  I suspect that it's the latter, caused by standard header dependency management in the generated files, not because of any cross-`.proto` dependencies.

In any case, we agree that it works :)
content.html:
Is it regenerating any of the .pb.h or pb.cc files (other than the ones associated with the .proto file that you changed), or is it only recompiling a bunch of pb.cc.o files? I suspect that it's the latter, caused by standard header dependency management in the generated files, not because of any cross-.proto dependencies.

In any case, we agree that it works :)
